Danger--DARK.$description:
Computed value of the color defined for contextual Danger.

Result equals a 50% Shade of that base value.

danger--MID.$description:
Computed value of the color defined for contextual Danger.

Result equals an 80% Tiny of that base value.

danger--LIGHT.$description:
Computed value of the color defined for contextual Danger.

Result equals a 20% Tint of that base value.

warning--DARK.$description:
Computed value of the color defined for a contextual Warning.

Result equals a 50% Shade of that base value.

warning--MID.$description:
Computed value of the color defined for a contextual Warning.

Result equals an 80% Tiny of that base value.

warning--LIGHT.$description:
Computed value of the color defined for a contextual Warning.

Result equals a 20% Tint of that base value.

Result equals a 50% Shade of that base value.

success--MID.$description:
Computed value of the color defined for contextual Success.

Result equals an 80% Tiny of that base value.

Success--LIGHT.$description:
Computed value of the color defined for contextual Success.

Result equals a 20% Tint of that base value.

info--DARK.$description:
Computed value of the color defined for contextual Information and Hyperlinking.

Result equals a 50% Shade of that base value.

info--MID.$description:
Computed value of the color defined for contextual Information and Hyperlinking.

Result equals an 80% Tiny of that base value.

info--LIGHT.$description:
Computed value of the color defined for contextual Information and Hyperlinking.

Result equals a 20% Tint of that base value.

Neutral Secondary--25%.$description: Applied in chorus with the 'Overlay Screen' Effect to create separation between layers of content.

Button Gradient--secondary-up.$description: Gradient transitions from 'Secondary' to 'Neutral Secondary,' with the lighter hue on top. Used on Secondary Button Hover State.

Button Gradient--primary-up.$description: Gradient transitions from 'Primary' to 'Neutral Primary,' with the lighter hue on top. Used on Primary Button Hover State.

Focus Ring.$description: Created with defined Link Color. White/Black represents transparent due to Figma limitations
